notifications.title: Insurance Coverage Discrepancy
notifications.message: Please contact the insurance desk regarding: Insurance Coverage Discrepancy
notifications.action_required: Investigate the discrepancy between the approved pre-authorization and the actual insurance payout. Verify if all billed procedures align with the pre-authorization, check for any unstated deductibles, co-pays, or non-covered services, and clarify the calculation of the patient's final balance.

notifications.title: Medication Order Pending Dispense
notifications.message: Your medication medication order pending dispense requires action.
notifications.action_required: Follow up with pharmacy to expedite dispensing of Jondise.

notifications.title: Discharge Medication Not Found in Pharmacy Orders
notifications.message: Your medication discharge medication not found in pharmacy orders requires action.
notifications.action_required: Verify Insulin Glargine prescription has been sent to pharmacy and track its order status immediately.

notifications.title: Potential Medication-Allergy Conflict
notifications.message: Your medication potential medication-allergy conflict requires action.
notifications.action_required: Review Dolo-Crosine prescription with prescribing physician considering the 'Liver complaint' allergy. Consider alternative analgesics or dose adjustment with liver function monitoring.

notifications.title: Final Invoice Not Generated
notifications.message: There is a billing matter that needs your attention: The final invoice for patient P00231 (ACC-00231-2024) has not been generated. Discharge cannot proceed without a finalized invoice.
notifications.action_required: Generate the final invoice and ensure all charges are accurately reflected.

notifications.title: Pending Billing Adjustments
notifications.message: There is a billing matter that needs your attention: There are pending adjustments that need to be resolved before the final invoice can be accurately generated. This includes an insurance pre-authorization and a dialysis procedure billing.
notifications.action_required: Expedite the resolution of all pending adjustments, especially the insurance pre-authorization and the dialysis procedure billing, to finalize the patient's account.

notifications.title: Required test pending
notifications.message: Your required test pending needs attention. Please contact the lab.
notifications.action_required: Ensure the Chest X-Ray is completed and reviewed before discharge.

notifications.title: Critical lab value detected
notifications.message: Your critical lab value detected needs attention. Please contact the lab.
notifications.action_required: Review the critical RBC value with the medical team and determine appropriate intervention or further investigation.

notifications.title: Critical lab value detected
notifications.message: Your critical lab value detected needs attention. Please contact the lab.
notifications.action_required: Review the critical Platelets value with the medical team and determine appropriate intervention or further investigation.

notifications.title: Critical lab value detected
notifications.message: Your critical lab value detected needs attention. Please contact the lab.
notifications.action_required: Review the critical Hemoglobin value with the medical team and determine appropriate intervention or further investigation.
